caption: Several penguins whispered to a zebra, then they burrowed underground. A lion stood on a stage with many applauding spectators in the audience below. In the evening, a group of chefs pushed a food cart to the animals' gathering. The lion swiftly devoured a piece of meat. A bunch of animals sat around tables, having a party. Several monkeys sipped tea, and some animals presented a birthday cake. The zebra blew out the candles, and the animals began to enjoy their meal. The zebra ended up with cream all over its face. Meanwhile, the hippo and the lion continued their conversation, and the lion stood on its head, trying to amuse the zebra.
